description: caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;

caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy;

name: ice out
description: extends cooldown on target move by 2; [cooldown 2];
applies 2 tough to target; applies 1 slow to target;
applies 2 energy to target; applies 1 burn to target;

name: restore
description: applies 2 regen to target; [cooldown 1];
applies 2 strong to target; applies 1 anger to target;
applies 1 random status to caster; applies 1 random status to target;
reduces energy for target by 2; if target loses more than 1 energy this way: applies 2 quick to target;

name: fluid motion
description: caster attunes to meta element; $e = declare element; loop: deals 2 $e element damage to enemy;

name: rocky two
description: caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 1 meta element damage to enemy;

name: hot shot
description: caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy; $e = randInt; if $e <= caster's energy: caster spends energy and applies 1 burn to enemy; else: caster gains 1 energy;

name: root cause
description: caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 1 meta element damage to enemy; target attunes to plant;

name: wound up
description: caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy; if enemy takes more than 2 damage from this move: applies 1 wound to target;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 1 meta element damage to enemy; if self has > 1 status: applies 1 decay to target;
caster attunes to meta element; loop: deals 2 meta element damage to enemy; if pay 1 energy: Quick Move;
banks target move; bank this move;
reduces cooldown on all moves caster owns by 1; [cooldown 2];

name: sweat out
description: $e = declareVar(element); negates target attunement to $e; if pay 2 energy: repeat this process; (loops until choose not to spend energy)
applies 1 regen to target; if target turns attuned to plant > 4: spends target attunement to plant: applies 1 sleep to target;
$e = declareVar(status); [cooldown 2]; while on cooldown: caster ignores status $e;
attempts curse on target; if succesful: reduces self curse chance by 3; else: applies 1 curse chance to target; applies 1 curse chance to caster;

name: eureka
description: init: (private)$t = randVar(turn(fibonacci)); on cast: if turn == $t: deals $t thunder damage to enemy; while banked: at start of turn: self gains 1 energy;
